_header: In summer before the Ascension / At Evensong on a Sunday
_description: ‘Mane nobiscum domine’ — ten 8-line stanzas with this refrain

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
IN Somer bi fore þe AscenciunAt Euensong on a
                    Sonundai…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Out of þis world whon we be brouȝtMane nobiscum
                        domine

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
IN somer bi fore þe ascenciunAt euensong on a
                    sunumday…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Out of þis world whon we be brouȝtMane nobiscum
                    domine
